SegmentGroup.name: A group of segments to identify technical rules applicable for all products contained in the message and the rules' issue dates.
A group of segments to identify governmental or legal trade restrictions and relevant commodities.
A group of segments for giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the whole message.
A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information relevant to the whole message.
A group of segments giving contact details of a specific person and, or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.
A group of segments used to provide references and where necessary, their dates, related to the party identified in the NAD segment.
A group of segments providing common product characteristic and common characteristic details.
A group of segments providing details of a single product. This segment group may be repeated to give subline details.

Element.name: Number of copies of document required
Number of originals of document required

SegmentGroup.name: A group of segments for naming, identification and short description of the product specified within the PRODAT message line item. This group may be repeated to provide name and, or description in one or more other languages.
A group of segments to identify technical rules applicable for the actual product and the rules' issue dates.
A group of segments to identify governmental or legal trade restrictions and relevant commodities.

A group of segments to provide quantity for the specified product and where relevant related date and time information for example minimum delivery batch, indication of manufacturer's capacity within a given period.
A segment group to specify the estimated value of an item only for budgetary purposes. This segment group may specify values over a given quantity range and for a current currency.
A group of segments providing product characteristic and-product characteristic details.
A group of segments providing information on origin and, or special conditions applicable to the product and - if required - relevant percentages.
A group of segments giving references related to the product specified in the LIN segment.
A group of segments identifying the parties with associated information.
A group of segments giving contact details of a specific person and, or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.
A group of segments containing information about dangerous goods.

Element.name: Category of means of transport, coded

SegmentGroup.name: A group of segments identifying product specific packaging of the goods identified in the line item, its physical dimensions and marks (for example special packaging relevant for the product).

Element.name: Returnable package freight payment responsibility, coded

SegmentGroup.name: A group of segments to specify hierarchical connections from the given product to higher or lower levelled products.
A group of segments to provide references linked to the hierarchical item and where necessary the reference date.
A group of segments to identify characteristics depending on the product's use within the specified hierarchy.
A segment group to specify party dependent information for the actual product in the given hierarchy.
A group of segments to identify characteristics depending on the product's use within the hierarchy specific to the identified party.

Element.name: Number of segments in a message
